page.title: 09MYSELF
page.content: My name is Emma Giles and I am 10 years old. I live at 38 South Street which is the largest house in our street.I have a brother called Martin who is 17 years old. My mother works at the baker's shop in the town centre and my Dad works as a roofer. I go to All Saints' School which is a Junior Mixed and Infants School. On Monday evenings I go to Drama group for 2 hours. We perform plays and also play games such as musical statues. I am in a play called The Park Keeper playing the part of a tramp! My favourite pop singer at the moment is Paul Young. I like to watch him on the VHS video which we have at home. I like collecting stickers and have over 300 on my bedroom door.I usually go shopping with my mother on Saturday mornings.I enjoy reading and borrow books from the County library.
